meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a falcon.
meanings.sent1: The falconine bird soared gracefully through the sky.
meanings.sent2: Her eyes had a falconine intensity when she focused on a task.
meanings.sent3: The falconine hat made him look like a bird enthusiast.
meanings.sent4: His falconine speed on the track earned him the nickname 'Speedy'.
meanings.sent5: The falconine features of the car gave it a sleek and aerodynamic look.

meanings.sent1: The falconine behavior of the bird indicated it was a trained falcon.
meanings.sent2: The falconine training techniques were passed down through generations.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her falconine reflexes helped her catch the bus on time.
meanings.sent4: The falconine partnership between the falconer and the bird was truly remarkable.
meanings.sent5: The falconine feathers of the falcon shimmered in the sunlight.
